title: Helen Flanagan showcases her incredible bikini body in a plunging khaki two-piece
text:
Helen Flanagan showcased her incredible bikini body as she hit the beach in Dubai.

The Coronation Street actress, 29, flaunted her enviably-toned abs and ample curves in a khaki two-piece.

Helen headed on holiday with her fiancé Scott Sinclair earlier this month, with the pair staying at the luxury five star hotel Le Royal Meridien.

Toned: Helen Flanagan showcased her incredible bikini body as she hit the beach in Dubai

Strolling along the sandy shore, the mother-of-two looked sensational in the plunging balconette bikini top, which drew attention to her ample cleavage and taut midriff.

The matching bikini bottoms, meanwhile, made the most of her tanned and toned pins and peachy derriere.

Donning a pair of oversized shades, Helen slicked her brunette hair off of her face and back into a bun.

Sizzling display: The Coronation Street actress, 29, flaunted her enviably-toned abs and ample curves in a khaki two-piece

Life of luxury: Helen headed on holiday with her fiancé Scott Sinclair earlier this month, with the pair staying at five star hotel, Le Royal Meridien

Busty: Strolling along the sandy shore, the mother-of-two looked sensational in the plunging balconette bikini top, which drew attention to her ample cleavage and taut midriff

The former I'm A Celebrity star seemed to be thoroughly enjoying her time off mummy duties as she flew solo for the beach jaunt.

After cooling off in the sea, Helen sat on a sun lounger to take in the idyllic views.

It comes after Helen joked she 'could have killed' fiancé Scott, 30, when she was pregnant with her four-year-old daughter Matilda.

Beach babe: The matching bikini bottoms, meanwhile, made the most of her tanned and toned pins and peachy derriere

Helen, who is also mum to Delilah, 16 months, said on on Giovanna Fletcher's Happy Mum Happy Baby podcast: 'I was 11 days overdue having contractions, and he was like "do you not think it is all in your head?"

The star said she called him 'all the names under the sun' before putting her own hospital bag in the car as Scott was 'doing his hair'.

Helen revealed that when they got to the hospital, she had yelled at the midwives to 'get him out', saying: 'I was looking at him thinking 'why isn't my mum here?'

'The second time wasn't much better. He looked a bit gormless, to be fair. They don't get it.'

Hair flick: Donning a pair of oversized shades, Helen slicked her brunette hair off of her face and back into a bun before letting it down as she cooled off in the sea

Sun-worshiper: After cooling off in the sea, Helen sat on a sun lounger to take in the idyllic views

Relaxing in style: The former I'm A Celebrity star seemed to be thoroughly enjoying her time off mummy duties as she flew solo for the beach jaunt

Helen also discussed intimate details how she fell pregnant with Matilda, revealing she was conceived at her parent's home in Manchester, in the same room the star herself was conceived in.

Helen went on to reveal that she and Scott - who have been together for a decade, now sleep 'top to tail' due to their children coming into the bed when they were younger, with Scott usually making way for them.

She said: 'He is just big in the bed and annoying.

'Maybe one day we will get round to sleeping next to each there but it makes me hot and sweaty.'
description: Helen Flanagan showcased her incredible bikini body in a plunging khaki two-piece as she hit the beach in Dubai.
